objects.query: Select id,Name,External_ID__c,StartingContext from Macro WHERE External_ID__c != null
SELECT Id,Category,Channel,External_Id__c,Message,Name,IsInsertable FROM QuickText WHERE External_ID__c != null
SELECT Id,Name,AcceptanceLabel,ActionReference,External_Id__c,Description,IsActionActive,RejectionLabel FROM Recommendation WHERE External_ID__c != null
